aiSummary: The customer wants to speak to an agent. The IVA connects them to an agent.

agentSummary.agentMessage: Customer greets the agent and wants to book a junior suite.

aiReplies: Hello There, How can I help you today?
Hi There, Welcome to C1. How can I help you?
Hi, it's nice to meet you, How can I help you with your reservation?
recommendations: Mrs. Smith, based on your preferences, I'd recommend upgrading from a Junior Suite to a Full Suite with a 420 ft balcony for an additional $38 per night. You can also add daily morning coffee service delivery to the Junior Suite for $22 per day. Would you like to add these optional services to your reservation?
